name: Exit, Pursued by Bear: THE GAME
name_original: Exit, Pursued by Bear: THE GAME
description:
In this game, you are an actor portraying Antigonus in Shakespeare's play Winter's Tale. Unfortunately for you, your vengeful understudy has released waves of actual bears to attack you upon the stage direction "Exit, pursued by bear." Fight back hordes of bears as you try to deliver lines, any lines, with poise and grace!

Jam Site: 
MIT Game Lab

Jam Year: 
2017

Diversifiers: 
NOT THE BEES

Platforms: 
MS Windows, Mac OS X

Tools And Technologies: 
Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: 
Used Gimp and Photoshop for art, Unity for the game.

Installation Instructions: 

You MUST play on 1280x800 resolution for the game to function. Other than that, just hit play and enjoy.
